page.title: 10LAINDON'S GRAFFITI ARTISTS
page.content: Some of the {graffiti}writings and drawings which have recently been appearing all over our area, are so good that{Basildon Council}have given permission for it to stay. The artist is{Metso 46.}His drawing covers the whole of a subway wall from floor to ceiling. The graffiti artists have strange names such as{Pony, Wiz, Jace and {Spark. Metso 46}seems to be king of the local graffiti writers. He has been fined a few times in the past. Until now all graffiti writing has been{illegal.}One member of the gang had to pay as much as Â£115. The youths are now trying to persuade {Basildon Council}to give special {licences}to serious graffiti artists so that it may be{legal.
